Marketing Opt-Out (Starter)

Subject: Marketing Opt-Out / Unsubscribe — [Your Name] — [Email]

To: [Company / Marketing / Support]

I object to and withdraw consent for marketing communications and request you stop sending marketing emails/SMS/push notifications to me.

Identifiers:

  • Name: [Name]
  • Email(s): [Email]
  • Phone (if applicable): [Phone]

Please confirm in writing that:

  • my marketing preferences have been updated
  • I have been removed from marketing lists (including any third-party marketing processors)

Regards, [Name]
